Name: Home Designer - Living Room
About the game: In this classic hidden object game, Hazel wants to help her aunt with home refurbishment. Sell off the old stuff and renovate the empty living room with real world furniture and design the room of your dreams! Offering tons of Hidden Object modes: Picture, Word, Silhouette, Spot the Difference, and many more! Play a variety of great minigames like Match-3, Card Memory, Jigsaw Puzzles, or skip them if you're not in the mood. - A classic HO game with tons of objects to find - More than 150 choices of furniture to decorate - Hidden Objects scenes in more than 15 different ways - 5 different mini-game typs, including Match-3
